title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Discover the ultimate yoga and fitness experience with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat. Measuring at a generous 72 inches by 24 inches and boasting a thickness of 2/5 inch, this mat provides an ample surface for even the most extensive sessions. Crafted from high-quality NBR foam, it offers both extra thickness for comfort and support as well as a soft cushion to protect your joints during your practice.

But that's not all - our mat comes with a convenient Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap included! This strap makes carrying your mat to and from the studio or home effortless, keeping your hands free for other essentials. Plus, its teal color adds an elegant touch to any fitness space.

Suitable for various practices such as yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises, our Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat is a versatile must-have for your wellness journey. Don't miss out on the unparalleled comfort it brings - order yours today!
